text: @realDonaldTrump You've had an entire term. People are fighting over justice, racism, quarantine, and even toilet paper. Our food is not fresh due to ur lack of COVID-19 preparation. And you've fenced yourself in to hide from us. #Biden2020 #Biden2020Landslide #GeorgeFloyd #BLM #TrumpMeltdown
